name: Crystal Glide Lipstick
details: Crystal Glide Liquid Eyeshadow is a weightless, yet intensely-playful, long-lasting liquid eye shadow that will saturate your lids in liquid-chrome-shine for up to 24 hours! Infused with pure color pigments and crystal chrome pearls, this innovative technology delivers vibrant, intense color for a buildable, no-feel finish.
description: Infused with pure color pigments & crystal chrome pearls for intense color

Crystal Glide Liquid Eyeshadow is a weightless, yet intensely-playful, long-lasting liquid eye shadow that will saturate your lids in liquid-chrome-shine for up to 24 hours! Infused with pure color pigments and crystal chrome pearls, this innovative technology delivers vibrant, intense color for a buildable, no-feel finish.
Can be used as an eyeliner to create sultry looks

name: Bronze Liquid Eyeshadow
details: A head-turning, long-wear liquid eyeshadow that delivers vibrant, high-shimmer color in a comfortable, crease-proof formula.
description: Infused with pure color pigments & crystal chrome pearls for intense color
